snippet.title: Warframe: 1999 Official Gameplay Trailer - Available Now on All Platforms!
snippet.description:
Warframe's new era has finally arrived.

Begin the next chapter of an epic, system-spanning Narrative with a spectacular new Quest set in the distant (and unfamiliar) past.

Overrun with Techrot, the city-state of Höllvania has descended into chaos. An elite fighting unit of Protoframes called The Hex are actively hunting for Albrecht Entrati. And the militaristic Scaldra have deployed their forces to establish control.

As the Drifter, you too are looking for Albrecht Entrati (as well the beguiling Man in the Wall). Take hold of your trusty Atomicycle and blaze a trail through Infested streets as you aid The Hex and search for answers, but don't underestimate the ruthlessness of the Scaldra.

In addition to The Hex Syndicate and Scaldra enemy faction, Warframe: 1999 also introduces our first-ever Romance & Relationship System, the 59th Warframe Cyte-09, a plethora of new Customizations and weaponry, Ability changes for Nyx and Trinity, and the new PvPvE game mode: Faceoff. Plus, keep your eyes peeled for the emergence of the Technocyte Coda (Infested Adversaries) in early 2025.

For full update details, visit www.warframe.com/1999.

►► WHAT IS WARFRAME?

Join 70M+ registered players in Warframe, a cooperative, free-to-play third-person looter shooter set in a constantly evolving sci-fi universe. For more info, visit https://warframe.com.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playwarframe
X: https://www.x.com/playwarframe
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/warframe.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playwarframe 
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/warframe
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/warframe
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/playwarframe
